name: Attorney's Badge
description1: No one would believe I was a defense attorney if I didn't carry this.

name: Cindy's Autopsy Report
description1: Time of death: 7/31, 4PM-5PM. Cause of death: loss of blood due to blunt trauma.

name: Statue
obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Payne.
description1: A statue in the shape of "The Thinker". It's rather heavy.

name: Passport
obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Payne.
description1: The victim apparently arrived home from Paris on 7/30, the day before the murder.

name: Blackout Record
obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Payne.
description1: Electricity to Ms. Stone's building was out from noon to 6 PM on the day of the crime.

name: Attorney's Badge
description1: No one would believe I was a defense attorney if I didn't carry this.

name: The Thinker
description1: The murder weapon. Looks like a statue, but it's actually a clock. Made by Larry Butz.
description2: Clock in the form of a statue. The clock's gears have been removed. Made by Larry Butz.

name: Glass Shards
description1: The broken remains of a glass light stand. Broken beyond all recognition.

name: Receipt
description1: A department store receipt with letters written in blood on the back.
description2: Receipt for a glass light stand. The date of purchase is the day before the murder.

name: Maya's Memo
description1: "A conversation I had with my sister is recorded on my cell phone."

name: Mia's Autopsy Report
description1: Time of death: 9/5 at 9:00PM. Cause: single blunt force trauma. Death was instantaneous.
description2: Died from a blow by a blunt object. May have lived for a few minutes after being hit.

name: Maya's Cell Phone
description1: Holds a conversation between the Chief and Maya. Click here for details.

name: Wiretap
description1: Found in Miss May's hotel room.

name: Floor Plans
obtained: Submitted as evidence during the trial.
description1: The murder scene, the Fey & Co. Law Offices. Click here for details.

name: May Testimony
description1: "The victim dodged an attack then ran to the right, but she was caught and struck."

name: Photograph
description1: On the back the words "DL-6 Incident - Exhibit A" are written in pencil.

name: Photograph
description1: On the back the words "DL-6 Incident - Exhibit B" are written in pencil.

name: Bellboy's Affidavit
description1: Describes the man who stayed with Miss May in the hotel on the night of the murder.

name: Newspaper Clipping
description1: Article about politician's suicide. The word "White" is written in pen at the top.

name: Mia's Memo
description1: A list of people's names in Mia's handwriting.

name: Attorney's Badge
description1: No one would believe I was a defense attorney if I didn't carry this.

name: Powers's Letter
description1: Document proving Will Powers's request for an attorney.

name: Guidemap
obtained: Retrieved at the front entrance of the studio.
description1: Guidemap to Global Studios. Click here for details.

name: Jack's Autopsy Report
description1: Time of death: 10/15 at 2:30 PM. Cause: Pierced through the chest by a spear.

name: Cardkey
description1: Cardkey for Studio Employees. Grants access into Studio One.

name: Powers'(?) Photo
obtained: Retrieved at the front entrance of the Studio.
description1: Taken at the gate between the entrance and the Studios. [Oct 15, 2:00 PM, Photo #2]
description2: He's dragging one leg. Click here for details. [Oct 15, 2:00 PM, Photo #2]

name: Samurai Spear
obtained: Submitted as evidence by Dick Gumshoe.
description1: This spear was found stuck in the chest of the victim.
description2: The murder weapon. A break in the shaft has been mended with duct tape.

name: Empty Bottle → Sleeping Pill Bottle
description1: Found on a table in the employee area. The label reads "Sleeping Pills."
description2: Found on a table in the employee area. Bears Jack Hammer's fingerprints.

name: Trailer Key
obtained: Retrieved at the front entrance of the Studio.
description1: The key tag reads "Studio Two Trailer".

name: Vasquez's Memo
description1: The memo read "Bring me the script from Episode 13".

name: Script
description1: A Steel Samurai script. The cover reads "Episode 13".

name: Mr. Monkey's Head
obtained: Retrieved in front of Studio One.
description1: Blocked the path to the scene of the crime between 2:15 PM and 4:00 PM.

name: Steel Samurai Card
description1: A trading card. Apparently, these are really popular with kids these days.

name: URP Card
description1: An "Ultra Rare Premium" Steel Samurai collectible card. Very valuable.

name: "Path to Glory"
description1: Contains photos of every victory scene in every battle the Steel Samurai has won.

name: Cody's Camera
obtained: Submitted as evidence during the trial.
description1: A new digital camera. Cody always carries it, though he's still learning how to use it.

name: Steak Plate
description1: Found in the employee area. On it are traces of sleeping pills and a large bone.

name: Five-Year-Old Photo
description1: Shows an accident involving Jack Hammer. Click here for details.

name: Van
obtained: Submitted as evidence during the trial.
description1: Manella used this van to drive Vasquez to Studio One after the meeting in the trailer.

name: Attorney's Badge
description1: No one would believe I was a defense attorney if I didn't carry this.

name: Popper
obtained: Retrieved from the Gourd Lake Public Beach.
description1: A classic party noisemaker. Pull the string, it goes "bang". Not very clue-worthy.

name: Lotta's Camera
obtained: Retrieved from the Gourd Lake Woods.
description1: Set to automatically take a picture when a loud noise is detected. Faces the lake.

name: Autopsy Report → Robert's Autopsy Report
description1: Time of death: sometime on the 24th or 25th. Cause: one bullet shot to the heart.
description2: Time of death: sometime on the 24th or 25th. Shot from approximately one meter away.

name: Lake Photo
description1: Taken automatically on 12/25 at 12:15 AM. Click here for details.

name: Gourdy Article
description1: Article about a monster sighted at Gourd Lake. Click here for details.

name: Misty Fey's Photo
description1: An old photograph. "DL-6 Incident - Exhibit A" is written on the back.

name: Edgeworth's Request
description1: Document proving Edgeworth's request for an attorney.

name: Overhead Map
obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
description1: Overhead map of Gourd Lake. Click here for details.

name: Pistol Bullet
obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
description1: Found in the victim's body. Fired from a 22-caliber pistol.
description2: Found in the victim's body. The ballistic markings match the murder weapon's barrel.

name: Pistol
obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
description1: The murder weapon. 22-caliber. Fired 3 times. Bears prints from Edgeworth's right hand.

name: Lotta's Deposition
obtained: Submitted as evidence during the trial.
description1: "I heard two sounds like gunshots just after midnight on 12/25."

name: Missile
description1: A K-9 unit in training. Very cute, with shiny eyes.

name: Fishing Pole
description1: Detective Gumshoe's personal fishing pole. Sadly flimsy and of dubious utility.

name: Metal Detector
description1: Makes a noise when metallic objects are near. A useful detection device.

name: Air Tank
obtained: Retrieved front of the Boat rental shop.
description1: An empty air tank. The valve is open, and a banner of flags is wrapped around it.

name: Second Lake Photo
description1: Shows an empty lake. Taken automatically on 12/24 at 11:50 PM.

name: Parrot
description1: The erstwhile companion of the boat rental shop caretaker. Answers to the name "Polly".

name: DL-6 Case File
description1: File on the DL-6 Incident. Click here for details.

name: DL-6 Incident Photo
description1: Photograph of the scene of the murder. Click here for details.

name: Letter from the Safe
description1: "Get your revenge on Miles Edgeworth." This note details the murder and set up.

name: DL-6 Bullet
description1: Taken from Gregory Edgeworth's heart. Still bears clear ballistic markings.

name: Attorney's Badge
description1: No one would believe I was a defense attorney if I didn't carry this.

name: Wallet
obtained: Retrieved from the Underground Parking Lot.
description1: A foldable wallet found at the crime scene. There seems to be something inside. * (Description not present in the original release)

name: Goodman's ID
obtained: Retrieved from the Underground Parking Lot.
description1: An investigator's ID card. Found at Prosecutor's Office crime scene. (ID# 5842189)

name: Edgeworth's Knife
obtained: Retrieved from the Underground Parking Lot.* (actually received when told about it by Miles Edgeworth in his office)
description1: The murder weapon, found in Edgeworth's toolbox. Traces of victim's blood. No prints.

name: Prosecutor Trophy
description1: Given to Edgeworth, King of Prosecutors, at the P.D. on the day of the murder.
description2: Two years ago the "halberd" was removed at Gant's behest, giving it its current form.

name: Parking Stub
description1: Record of parking in the Prosecutor's Office lot. Entered lot at 5:12 PM.

name: Blue Badger Panel
obtained: Retrieved from the Police department entrance.
description1: A "work of art" designed by the Head Detective and created by Detective Gumshoe.

name: Letter of Introduction
description1: Received from Detective Gumshoe. Allows bearer to investigate the crime scene.

name: Goodman's Autopsy Report
description1: Death due to loss of blood. One knife wound. Died within an hour and a half of 4 PM.

name: Cell Phone → Lana's Cell Phone
obtained: Retrieved from the Underground Parking Lot.
description1: Property of Lana Skye. Last call made at 5:18 on the day of the murder.
description2: Property of Lana Skye. Last call made to her sister Ema at 5:18 on the day of the murder.
description3: The word "muffler" was overheard during a call made to Ema at 5:18.

name: Victim's Note
obtained: Retrieved from the Underground Parking Lot.
description1: Victim's memo found in the car trunk.

name: Parking Lot Floor Plans
obtained: Submitted as evidence during the trial.
description1: The parking lot with Edgeworth's car. Click here for details.

name: Crime Photo
obtained: Submitted as evidence during the trial.
description1: The moment of the crime as photographed by Angel Starr. Click here for details.
description2: Taken by Angel Starr after the crime was committed. Click here for details.

name: Victim's Shoe
obtained: Submitted as evidence during the trial.
description1: White enamel shoe. Bears traces of blood from Goodman and Lana Skye.

name: Switchblade Knife
obtained: Submitted as evidence during the trial.
description1: Found at the crime scene, wrapped in the defendant's muffler. Small tag attached.
description2: The broken tip was found in the victim's body. Belonged to murderer Joe Darke.

name: Luminol Testing Fluid
description1: Solution used for scientific investigation. Finds bloods traces. "Spray" to use.

name: Steak Lunch
description1: Received from Ms. Starr. Excellent for putting Officer Marshall in a good mood.

name: Goodman's Lost Item Report
obtained: Received from the chief of the detectives.
description1: A half-written document. The date was 2/21. To be submitted to the Chief.

name: ID Card Record
description1: IDs of all who entered the evidence room on 2/21.

name: Evidence Room Floor Plans
description1: Scene of the stabbing of a detective at the P.D. Click here for details.

name: Evidence Locker
description1: Each locker is unlocked using a detective's fingerprint. A light indicates open boxes.

name: Rubber Glove
description1: The tag reads "SL-9 Incident". Extremely thin rubber glove.

name: Unstable Jar
description1: Jar pieced back together from fragments found at the crime scene. A piece is missing.
description2: Evidence from the SL-9 Incident. Final fragment found in Chief Gant's safe. Blood traces.
description3: Final fragment found in Chief Gant's safe. "Ema" is written on the surface in blood.

name: Screwdriver
description1: Evidence from a past case of Edgeworth's. Brought back to his office by Gant's request.

name: Fingerprinting Set
description1: Recovers fingerprints from "handprints" for comparison with fingerprint file.

name: Marshall's Print
description1: Found on a bloody handprint left in the evidence room. The print had been wiped.
description2: Found on a bloody handprint on Marshall's own locker. The print had been wiped.

name: Security Video
obtained: Submitted as evidence during the trial.
description1: Video from the security camera placed in the evidence room. Click here for details.

name: SL-9 Incident Files
description1: Files for the "Darke killings", solved two years ago. Click here for details.

name: Gant Team Picture
description1: Photo at the awards ceremony of Gant, Lana and Neil. Click here for details.

name: Neil's Autopsy Report
description1: Stabbed in the back, died from punctured heart and lung. A knife tip was in the wound.

name: Letter of Resignation
obtained: Retrieved from the High Prosecutor's Office.
description1: Edgeworth's discarded letter of resignation. He's serious.

name: Gumshoe's ID
description1: A Police Department ID card. Allows access to areas of the P.D. open to detectives.

name: Evidence List
description1: List of evidence in the SL-9 Incident. Ripped in half, so only part remains.
description2: List of evidence in the SL-9 Incident. The remaining half was found in Gant's desk. Click here for details.

name: Strip of Cloth
description1: Found in Chief Gant's safe. Evidence for something, but what? Bears Ema Skye's prints.

name: Evidence Law
description1: From Ms. Skye. Explains the two rules of evidence law. Click here for details.

name: Lana's Picture
description1: Crime scene photo from the case two years ago. Click here for details.
